name: Leaf 3 Core
description: These are projects built using a basic Leaf 3 scaffold.

products.name: [WIP] Complete authentication API
products.description: This project is a complete authentication system built with Leaf 3. It includes a full user registration system, OTP verification, password reset, and more.
